page.title: 03Court Farm continued.
page.content: {Labour:}Apart from the family,the only other workers are occassional contract workers brought on to the farm at harvest time. {Machinery:}The farm has the following equipment:{4}tractors,{1} combine harvester,{1 }baler,{2} ploughs,{1 disc harrow,{1 }drag harrow, {1} chain harrow,{1 }fertilizer spinner,{1 sprayer, {1} corn drill. A{flack {eight system }is used for baling hay into bales of eight. The dairy unit is electronically controlled. {Fertilizers:}Court farm uses 70 tons of fertilizer a year.50 tons are { {nitrate }based and 40 tons are { {compund }based. {Crops:} 100 acres of land are used for wheat,50 acres for barley,and 150 acres are used for grass.(mostly hay). Barley is sold to Oldacres,an animal feedstuffs factory in Bishops Cleeve.
